meta.description: Comprehensive Chicago sports media sources for Media Sentiment on test.sportsmockery.com. Claude should use this as a starting point, add slugs/platform_ids/follower counts, and expand further via provided reference URLs and public research.
notes: Only include outlets/accounts with ~5k+ followers/subs when seeding.
Claude should verify all URLs and handles before finalizing.
Official team channels (Cubs, Bears, Bulls, Blackhawks, White Sox) are included where available.
Regional sports networks (CHSN replacing NBC Sports Chicago for some teams).
Includes national outlets with heavy Chicago focus.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune - Sports
major_outlets.notes: Main Tribune sports RSS; Claude should parse and extract team-specific feeds.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune - Breaking News
major_outlets.notes: For broader Chicago news that impacts sports teams and personalities.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Sun-Times - Sports
major_outlets.notes: Local alternative to Tribune; strong sports coverage.

major_outlets.name: ChicagoSportsHQ - RSS Hub
major_outlets.notes: Aggregator with team-specific feeds; Claude should extract individual team RSS URLs.

major_outlets.name: ChicagoBullsHQ - Bulls News & Rumors
major_outlets.notes: Dedicated Bulls site with feature/news/rumor RSS feeds.

major_outlets.name: Sports Talk Chicago
major_outlets.notes: Chicago sports podcast/show with RSS feed; heavy on Bears.

major_outlets.name: Bleacher Nation - Cubs
major_outlets.notes: SB Nation Cubs blog; dedicated Cubs coverage.

major_outlets.name: Blackhawk Up
major_outlets.notes: FanSided Blackhawks blog; high-signal Blackhawks coverage. Founded by Greg Boysen.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Bears Official Site
major_outlets.notes: Official Bears RSS; splits into After Further Review, Chalk Talk, Game Recap feeds.

major_outlets.name: Marquee Sports Network / Cubs
major_outlets.notes: Regional network co-owned by Cubs; check for RSS or live update feeds.

regional_and_national.name: ESPN.com - Chicago
regional_and_national.notes: National network with Chicago-focused content; check for RSS.

regional_and_national.name: MLB.com - Chicago Cubs
regional_and_national.notes: Official MLB page for Cubs; includes beat reporter feeds.

regional_and_national.name: MLB.com - Chicago White Sox
regional_and_national.notes: Official MLB page for White Sox.

major_outlets.name: CHGO Sports
major_outlets.notes: AllCity hub for all Chicago teams; primary source for Chicago sports talk.

major_outlets.name: ESPN Chicago
major_outlets.notes: ESPN 1000 radio; primary home of Bears and White Sox; national ESPN presence.

major_outlets.name: 670 The Score
major_outlets.notes: Major Chicago sports radio; moving to FM band; covers all 5 teams daily.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune Sports
major_outlets.notes: Tribune's official sports account; beat reporter updates.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Sun-Times Sports
major_outlets.notes: Sun-Times sports account.

major_outlets.name: NBC Sports Chicago / CHSN
major_outlets.notes: NBC regional sports network; transitioning to CHSN for some teams.

major_outlets.name: CBS Chicago Sports
major_outlets.notes: Local CBS affiliate sports coverage.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Dan Wiederer (Bears)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Senior Bears beat writer for Tribune; long-tenured, highly respected.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Sean Hammond (Bears)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Bears beat writer; 5+ years covering Bears.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: KC Johnson (Bulls)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Longest-tenured and most respected Bulls beat reporter.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Jamal Collier (Bulls)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: ESPN NBA reporter with Midwest focus; based in Chicago; covers Bulls and wider Midwest.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Joe Cowley (Bulls)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Bulls beat reporter; also does radio work.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Greg Boysen (Blackhawks)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Blackhawks expert; covering since 2011; formerly CHGO, SB Nation.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Caley Chelios (Blackhawks)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Blackhawks reporter/analyst on broadcast; daughter of NHL legend Chris Chelios.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Kacy Standohar (Bears/Multi)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: NBC sports reporter; covers Bears and other Chicago teams.

beat_reporters_and_analysts.name: Alyssa Bergamini (Bulls/Multi)
beat_reporters_and_analysts.notes: Bulls reporter/radio personality; only female covering Bulls.

podcasts_and_shows.name: Locked On Bears
podcasts_and_shows.notes: Daily Bears podcast; hosted by Lorin Cox (PFF analyst).

podcasts_and_shows.name: Locked On Sports Chicago
podcasts_and_shows.notes: Multi-team podcast covering all Chicago teams.

podcasts_and_shows.name: The Stretch (Barstool)
podcasts_and_shows.notes: Barstool Sports Chicago; Eddie, Chief, White Sox Dave; comedic sports talk.

major_outlets.name: FOX 32 Chicago
major_outlets.notes: Local TV affiliate; sports segments and highlight shares.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune
major_outlets.notes: Main Tribune page; shares sports content and articles.

major_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune Sports
major_outlets.notes: Dedicated Tribune sports page.

major_outlets.name: NBC Chicago
major_outlets.notes: Local NBC affiliate; sports news and highlights.

major_outlets.name: ABC 7 Chicago
major_outlets.notes: Local ABC affiliate; sports coverage.

major_outlets.name: CBS Chicago
major_outlets.notes: Local CBS affiliate; sports and news.

local_outlets.name: Chicago Tribune
local_outlets.notes: Tribune's YouTube channel; sports, news, entertainment.

local_outlets.name: FOX 32 Chicago
local_outlets.notes: Local TV affiliate; sports clips and daily coverage.

sports_media.name: CHGO Sports
sports_media.notes: Fastest-growing Chicago sports digital outlet; daily shows, podcasts.

sports_media.name: Locked On Sports Chicago
sports_media.notes: Daily podcast with postcast shows after every Bears game.

sports_media.name: Bleacher Nation
sports_media.notes: SB Nation Cubs blog; Cubs coverage.

radio_and_podcasts.name: 670 The Score
radio_and_podcasts.notes: Major Chicago sports radio; moving to 104.3 FM; covers all 5 teams daily.

radio_and_podcasts.name: ESPN 1000
radio_and_podcasts.notes: ESPN Chicago radio; home of Bears and White Sox coverage.

radio_and_podcasts.name: Barstool Sports Chicago
radio_and_podcasts.notes: Barstool Chicago office; The Stretch show; comedy-sports mix.

radio_and_podcasts.name: The Rekap Podcast
radio_and_podcasts.notes: Chicago sports recap podcast; daily takes.

blogs_and_independent_sites.name: Bleacher Report (Chicago teams)
blogs_and_independent_sites.notes: National with Chicago sections; BR app heavily used.

blogs_and_independent_sites.name: Barstool Sports (national with Chicago desk)
blogs_and_independent_sites.notes: National outlet; Chicago office; Carl Nassib, WSD, etc.

reference_urls_for_claude_expansion.name: Best Chicago Bears Twitter Follows (Yahoo/2023)
reference_urls_for_claude_expansion.purpose: Mine for additional high-quality Bears beat writers and accounts > 5k followers.

reference_urls_for_claude_expansion.purpose: Community recommendations for Bulls media sources; KC Johnson, CHGO, etc.

reference_urls_for_claude_expansion.purpose: Identify Blackhawks expert Greg Boysen and other Hawks writers.

reference_urls_for_claude_expansion.purpose: Extract exact Tribune sports RSS feed URLs and metadata.
